name: Frogue Legacy
description:
WebGL Version available HERE! Come back to Rate!

Casual game with rogue-lite elements and a co-op AI companion.

Eat bugs as Frogue, the rogue-frog and protect your spider robot companion and her eggs.

Compete to be #1 on the Scoreboard!

-----------------------------------------------

Make sure to get the tongue upgrade to hit enemies further away!

-----------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Move
  • LMB - Tongue Attack
